GlobalSelling.title: Amazon Global Selling: Access to the top international retail markets

Headers.startSelling: Start selling on Amazon right after buying an aged account or an entire online business
Headers.details: After your payment, you will be given access to full account details such as: login, e-mail details, bank card information and other important documentation.

SectiomOne.account_verification_description: Each account goes through an expanded multi-level authentication before the commercial offer.

seller_accounts.amazon_seller_title: Buy new or aged Amazon Seller account
seller_accounts.aged_accounts_description: Aged seller accounts are checked by account health, sales history, suspensions, type of fulfillment used to sell, feedback quantity and quality, all performance notifications and ungated brands or categories. As we are having a dropshipping business on Amazon, we know everything about suspensions and importance to check all this information before selling any of the accounts.
seller_accounts.new_accounts_description: New seller accounts that were not suspended upon registration and are almost guaranteed to have no utility bill request in future. We never experienced Amazon asking for a utility bill in case it wasn't requested in the beginning. These accounts can be used both for selling or for technical purposes.

complex_launch_section.title: Amazon Complex Launch
complex_launch_section.description: Business on Amazon is a profitable thing but it’s not easy and time-consuming. Our team has been through it multiple times. We will build your business as well: we do and consult, you make decisions.

SectionContact.step1_desc: Select all necessary services you need.
SectionContact.step2_desc: Discuss your project details with our team.
SectionContact.step3_desc: We will help you optimize your costs.
SectionContact.step4_desc: Launch your business with our support.

Comment.leave_request_desc: It will take you less than sixty seconds. A member of our team will contact you shortly after.

Com.review_1_text: I have to say, 'amazmarkets' gets over an A+ rating from me. I will be recommending this company and team to everyone. Thanks again!
Com.review_2_text: Excellent and professional service. Very friendly and helpful. Would definitely use again. Highly recommend!

Chel.submit_valuation_request_description: Simply answer the question using our online form.
Chel.we_get_to_know_each_other: We get to know each other
Chel.we_get_to_know_each_other_description: One of our friendly sales managers will contact you to request additional information and will also answer all your questions.
Chel.we_suggest_fair_price_description: After reviewing all the information you have submitted and taking your opinion into account we suggest a fair and honest price for your account.

Gul.evaluation_tool_title: Feel free to use our online evaluation tool to find out how much your account could be worth

Lom.account_transfer_title: Details that will be changed during an account transfer

Job.transfer_process_title: A step by step explanation of the transfer and sales process
Job.step_1_title: Submit calculator and appoint a call
Job.step_1_description: Find out the cost of your account and book a call to consult with our manager.
Job.step_2_title: Receive an email with screen sharing details
Job.step_2_description: You will receive call details and your manager’s name.
Job.step_3_description: Our team member will make a screen sharing session with you to check your account statistics.
Job.step_4_title: It’s time to sign a bill of sale
Job.step_4_description: We use e-signature for a bill of sale.
Job.step_5_description: You will receive money for your account in 2-3 business days. You will get the confirmation.
Job.step_6_title: Transferring your account to a new owner
Job.step_6_description: Schedule a time for a final screen sharing session. We will help you to fill in details for your account transfer.

Fer.check_account_desc: Check the account of your choice via TeamViewer or AnyDesk. You inspect the account from your end to confirm your selection.
Fer.payment_desc: We take a payment using your preferred method. We accept: Payoneer, bank transfer and bitcoin.
Fer.account_ownership_desc: We give you all the log in details to your new account. After that, you set up your own password and Two-Step authentication methods for your Amazon account and Virtual Proxy Server where your account is located.
Fer.account_setup_desc: We help you set up the details like your deposit/change method, business address and legal entity on your Amazon account.
